text: "Hanging on the Telephone" is a 1978 song by American band Blondie. It was taken from their third studio album Parallel Lines. It went to number 5 in the United Kingdom, number 20 in the Netherlands, number 16 in Ireland, number 43 in New Zealand, number 39 in Australia, number 19 in Belgium. It failed to chart in the United States. ==Track listing== ;UK 7" (CHS 2266) #"Hanging on the Telephone" (Jack Lee) – 2:17 #"Will Anything Happen" (Lee) – 2:55 ;US 7" (CHS 2271) #"Hanging on the Telephone" (Lee) – 2:17 #"Fade Away and Radiate" (Chris Stein) – 3:57 == References == Category:1976 songs Category:1978 songs Category:Blondie (band) songs Category:Power pop songs
title: Hanging on the Telephone
